body: I Was Just wondering if one of the managers could fix this because it is really annoying that i can not see if i can join or not
body_tagged: I Was Just wondering if one of the managers could fix this because it is really annoying that i can not see if i can join or not
title: No Way To See If Walls Have Started

replies.body:
This took me awhile to figure out too. 
If the color of the map name is green, you can join.
If the color of the map name is red, you can't join, but you can spectate.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
^
Also the spectate thing is only for Donators :/
